summary: Kurt Ingston, a rich recluse, invites the doctors who left him a hopeless cripple to his desolate mansion in the swamps as one by one they meet horrible deaths.
cast: Bela Lugosi|Lionel Atwill|Leif Erickson|Irene Hervey|Ralph Morgan|Don Porter|Nils Asther|Fay Helm|Frank Reicher|Doris Lloyd|Francis Pierlot|Robert Homans|Janet Shaw|Eddy Waller|Cyril Delevanti
title: Night Monster
